With another tap, turn the card over to see U.S. and Canadian trade names and the drugâs therapeutic and pharmacologic classifications. Features:1) Multiple card sets are organized alphabetically by generic drug name for easy reference.2) Self-scoring and bookmarking allow for quick review.3) Link to the audio pronunciation of the generic drug name appears on each card.4) Card front features generic name, phonetic spelling, and audio link; card back lists U.S. and Canadian trade names and the drugâs therapeutic and pharmacologic classifications.5) Content downloads directly to your mobile device; no web connection is necessary after the initial download.About F.A.
